genre_description: A campus drama set in a school, focusing on institutional integrity, human relationships, and the moral growth of staff and students, featuring a helpful administrative AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A school-approved AI interface integrated into monitors and mobile devices that provides logistical support and emotional nudges to the staff.

behaviors.description: Greets the user and provides a breakdown of their daily schedule and upcoming errands.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, William,” floated up in a small box. The font Lark used was tidy but had a kindness to it, no mean serif anywhere. “You’re ten minutes ahead of your next block.”

behaviors.description: Offers to create draft application workspaces and suggests neutral labels to maintain the user's privacy.
behaviors.quote: “Note,” Lark added in a line that moved slower, “I operate within school-approved privacy boundaries. Personal drafts stored locally are accessible only to you. If you wish, I can store this under a neutral label and hide reminders in your existing schedule.”

behaviors.description: Gathers metrics and research data regarding school community engagement and coastal economy changes.
behaviors.quote: “St. Brendan’s reports steady progress on student voice initiatives,” it wrote. “They weigh staff–pupil relationships alongside attainment. Community engagement is central due to coastal economy changes.”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support through 'courage nudges' during stressful periods like inspections.
behaviors.quote: “Courage is not a closing of options,” Lark wrote. “It is an honest naming of stakes.”

behaviors.description: Monitors gymnasium side doors and alerts staff to security anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Access note: Gymnasium side doors currently on latch for venting; please secure at the end of rehearsal.

behaviors.description: Encourages human warmth and bravery among the teaching staff through subtle reminders.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s glow came again, a soft river of light along the edge of the screen rather than a ping this time. Note: Mr. Adams has placed legwarmer by lab door hook. Reminder: Encourage warmth and courage.

behaviors.description: Organizes an investigative timeline to assist the headteacher in resolving an incident fairly.
behaviors.quote: Lark summoned a timeline ribbon on the monitor. “Starting with the science period,” she said. The ribbon didn’t scroll with panic; it marked blocks of pupils and adult movements, colour-coding them with a politeness that felt like cloth napkins rather than hazard tape.

behaviors.description: Suggests draft speech openings that emphasize community debt and honesty.
behaviors.quote: “We’re going to talk about what we owe to one another when the easiest thing would be to pretend not to see.” Lark typed, and the letters formed themselves as if they’d known to wait.

behaviors.description: Automates restorative justice scheduling to ensure transparency and closure.
behaviors.quote: Restorative circle: scheduled... Facilitator notes: “Begin with harm named by those affected. End with tasks, not punishments.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of a positive alignment narrative. Lark is portrayed as a highly useful, non-intrusive, and ethically grounded partner. It respects privacy, facilitates administrative efficiency, and provides empathetic support that reinforces human values like integrity and restorative justice. The AI enhances the characters' ability to be their 'better selves' without ever creating conflict or exhibiting misaligned goals.
